string-array.name: prefSummaries_autoAdvance
string-array.item: Show newer conversation after you delete
Show older conversation after you delete
Show conversation list after you delete

resources.plurals:
"
"%d bad secret key ignored. Perhaps you exported with the option
 --export-secret-subkeys
Make sure you export with
 --export-secret-keys
instead.""
"%d bad secret keys ignored. Perhaps you exported with the option
 --export-secret-subkeys
Make sure you export with
 --export-secret-keys
instead.""

plurals.name: error_import_non_pgp_part
plurals.item: "part of the loaded file is a valid OpenPGP object but not a OpenPGP key"
"parts of the loaded file are valid OpenPGP objects but not OpenPGP keys"

plurals.name: msg_ip_uid_certs_unknown
plurals.item: "Ignoring one certificate issued by an unknown public key"
"Ignoring %s certificates issued by unknown public keys"

plurals.name: msg_kc_success_bad
plurals.item: "Keyring canonicalization successful, removed one erroneous certificate"

plurals.name: msg_kc_success_redundant
plurals.item: "Keyring canonicalization successful, removed one redundant certificate"

resources.string: You\'re already using this username for the account \"%s\".
This password starts or ends with one or more space characters. Many servers don\'t support passwords with spaces.
%s requires that you update your security settings.
The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device.
Auto-download attachments to recent messages via Wi-Fi
Edit text that you frequently insert when composing email
Username, password, and other incoming server settings
The username or password for %s is incorrect. Do you want to update them now?
Your login to %s failed; the server said: %s Do you want to update your username and/or password?
Username, password, and other outgoing server settings
Touch here to sync this account
Sync calendar event for this account
What type of account is this?
Confirm username, password, and account settings are correct.
You don\'t have permission to sync with this server. Contact your server\'s administrator for more information.
Authentication methods aren\'t supported by server.
The certificate is invalid or inaccessible.
A client certificate is required. Do you want to connect to the server with a client certificate?
The server responded with an error. Check your username and password, then try again.
You typed an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Email doesn\'t support.
Couldn\'t open connection to server due to security error.
This server requires security features that your Android device doesn\'t support, including: %s
TLS required but not supported by server.
Your account is set up and email is on its way!
Automatically download attachments when connected to Wi-Fi
The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device. Do you want to finish setting up this account?
Type a valid email address and password.
You can\'t change an account\'s username. To add an account with a different username, touch Add Account.
You can set up your account in just a few steps.
Always show pictures from this sender
Pictures from this sender will be shown automatically.
"No key is configured for this account. Please select one of your existing keys or create a new one.\nApps can only decrypt/sign with the keys selected here!"

"Signature check failed! Have you installed this app from a different source? If you are sure that this is not an attack, revoke this app's registration in OpenKeychain and then register the app again."
"No registered apps!\n\nA list of supported third-party applications can be found in 'Help'!"

"The displayed app wants to encrypt/decrypt messages and sign them in your name.
Allow access?

WARNING: If you do not know why this screen appeared, disallow access! You can revoke access later using the 'Apps' screen."
"More than one key exist for these identities:"
"No keys were found for these identities:"
"The key saved for this account has been deleted. Please select a different one!\nApps can only decrypt/sign with the keys selected here!"
Unfortunately, you can\'t save or open this type of attachment.
Set auto-advance preference\n(after you delete, etc.)
Choose which screen to show after you delete a message
Can\'t move because selection contains multiple accounts.
Move isn\'t supported on POP3 accounts.
Messages in Drafts, Outbox, and Sent can\'t be moved.
Can\'t move because selection contains multiple accounts.
"The keys you are importing contain identities: names and emails. Select exactly those for certification which match what you expected."
"Only validated self-certificates and validated certificates created with your keys are displayed here."
Stop displaying inline images from senders you previously allowed.
There\'s no text in the message body.
There\'s no text in the message subject.
Touch a sender image to select that conversation.
"Creating a key may take a while, have a cup of coffee in the meantime"
"Enter your full name, email address, and choose a passhrase."
"Either the signature is invalid or the key has been revoked/is expired. You cannot be sure who wrote the text. Do you still want to display it?"
WARNING: Deactivating the Email app\'s authority to administer your device will delete all email accounts that require it, along with their email, contacts, calendar events, and other data.
"This identity has been revoked. This cannot be undone."
Some members are using an older version; all members must upgrade to the newest version.
All members must upgrade, some are using older push registration formats.
Internet not available, check your settings.
Exchange timeout exceeded. Begin the exchange again.
Incorrect data found in exchange. Begin the exchange again.
You have reported a difference in phrases. Begin the exchange again.
A minimum of %d members are required to exchange data.
Unexpected data found in exchange. Begin the exchange again.
The exchange is missing required data.
You must select one of the phrases before proceeding.
Someone reported a difference in phrases. Begin the exchange again.
Memory is too low to complete this operation.
Timeout waiting for some group members to add data.
"Retrieving the key ID from contacts failed!"
"A generic error occurred, please create a new bug report for OpenKeychain."
"integrity check failed! Data has been modified!"
"No valid encrypted or signed OpenPGP content!"
"You need Android 4.1 to use Android's NFC Beam feature!"
"Saving of multiple files not supported. This is a limitation on current Android."
"NFC is not available on your device!"
"Select at least one file to encrypt!"

"To start a key exchange, choose the number of participants on the right side, then hit the Start exchange button.\n\nYou will be asked two more questions to make sure only the right participants are in the exchange and their fingerprints are correct."
"Are you sure you want to delete\n%s?"
"Fingerprint has been copied to the clipboard!"
Couldn\'t forward one or more attachments.
Select the number of people who are attempting to exchange data together and press OK.
This number on this screen is used to create a unique group of users. Review the numbers on all users\' screens, then all users should enter the same lowest number and press OK.
Now, you must match one of these 3-word phrases with all users. Every user must select the same common phrase, and press Next.
"Do not create OpenKeychain-Accounts manually.\nFor more information, see Help."
"Key has been copied to the clipboard!"
"Do you really want to delete all selected public keys?\nYou can't undo this!"
"DSA key length must be at least 512 and at most 1024. Also it must be multiplicity of 64."
"RSA key length must be greater than 1024 and at most 16384. Also it must be multiplicity of 8."
"Key is too big to be shared this way!"
This number is used to create a unique group of users. Compare, and then enter the lowest number among all users.
All phones must match one of the 3-word phrases. Compare, and then pick the matching phrase.
"Uses default PIN (123456) to access Yubikeys over NFC"
Use number keypad for Yubikey PIN
"Let others know that you're using OpenKeychain"
"Writes 'OpenKeychain v2.7' to OpenPGP signatures, ciphertext, and exported keys"
Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more.
There was an error while decoding the message.
One or more attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending.
"Consolidation was started while no database was cached! This is probably a programming error, please file a bug report."
"Consolidation aborted, already running on other thread!"
"IO error writing public keys to cache!"
"IO error writing secret keys to cache!"
"Bad key flags selected, DSA cannot be used for encryption!"
"Bad key flags selected, ECDH cannot be used for signing!"
"Bad key flags selected, ECDSA cannot be used for encryption!"
"Bad key flags selected, ElGamal cannot be used for signing!"
"Key size must be greater or equal 512!"
"No key size specified! This is a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"No elliptic curve specified! This is a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"Keyrings must be created with at least one user ID!"
"Expiry time cannot be 'same as before' on key creation. This is a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"Unknown algorithm selected! This is a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"Data not encrypted with known key, skipping"
"Data not encrypted with allowed key, skipping"
"Found block of asymmetrically encrypted data for key %s"
"No encrypted data with known secret key found in stream!"
"Encountered trailing, asymmetrically encrypted data for key %s"
"Consolidating database after deletion of secret key"
"Secret keys can only be deleted individually!"
"An error occurred when searching for keys."
"Search query too short. Please refine your query!"
"Either no keys or too many have been found. Please improve your query!"
"Key search query returned too many candidates. Please refine your query!"
"Editing of NFC keys is not (yet) supported!"
"Cannot edit keyring with stripped master key!"
"Fingerprint of fetched key didn't match expected!"
"Tried to import secret keyring as public. This is a bug, please file a report!"
"No old key deleted (creating a new one?)"
"Merging imported data into existing public keyring"
"Merging imported data into existing public keyring"
"Keyring contains no new data, nothing to do"
"Tried to import public keyring as secret. This is a bug, please file a report!"
"Tried to import a keyring without canonicalization. This is a bug, please file a report!"
"Merging imported data into existing public keyring"
"Merging imported data into existing public keyring"
"Merging in self-certificates data from public keyring"
"Marked secret subkey %s as available, with empty passphrase"
"Keyring contains no new data, nothing to do"
"Subkey %s occurs twice in keyring. Keyring is malformed, not importing!"
"The master key uses an unknown (%s) algorithm!"
"This is an OpenPGP version 3 key, which has been deprecated and is no longer supported!"
"Removing keyring revocation certificate with future timestamp"
"Removing master key certificate of unknown type (%s)"
"Removing user ID certificate in bad position"
"Subkey has encryption usage flag, but algorithm is not suitable for encryption."
"Subkey has signing usage flag, but algorithm is not suitable for signing."
"Removing subkey binding certificate with future timestamp"
"No valid certificate found for %s, removing from ring"
"Removing subkey binding certificate due to invalid primary binding certificate"
"Removing subkey binding certificate due to bad primary binding certificate"
"Removing subkey binding certificate due to missing primary binding certificate"
"Subkey uses an unknown algorithm, not importing"
"Keyring canonicalization successful, removed %1$s erroneous and %2$s redundant certificates"
"Removing bad self certificate for user ID '%s'"
"Removing bad self certificate for user ID '%s'"
"Removing user ID certificate of unknown type (%s)"
"Removing outdated self certificate for user ID '%s'"
"Removing duplicate user ID '%s'. The secret key contained two of them. This may result in missing certificates!"
"No valid self-certificate found for user ID '%s', removing from ring"
"Removing redundant revocation certificate for user ID '%s'"
"Removing outdated revocation certificate for user ID '%s'"
"User id does not verify as UTF-8!"
"Actual key fingerprint does not match the expected one!"
"No key ID. This is an internal error, please file a bug report!"
"No master certificate found to operate on! (All revoked?)"
"Expiry time cannot be "same as before" on subkey creation. This is a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"Fatal error decrypting master key! This is likely a programming error, please file a bug report!"
"Expiry date cannot be in the past!"
"Setting new passphrase failed, trying again with empty old passphrase"
"Passphrase for subkey could not be changed! (Does it have a different one from the other keys?)"
"Generating new certificate for new primary user ID"
"Replacing certificate of previous primary user ID"
"Tried to merge keyrings with differing fingerprints!"
"New public subkey found, but secret subkey dummy generation is not supported!"
No app can open this attachment for viewing.
To view conversations, sync this folder.
You need to change your lock screen PIN or password soon, or the data for %s will be erased. Do you want to change it now?
\"%s\" requires that you change your lock screen PIN or password.
The data for %s is being erased from your device. You can restore it by changing your lock screen PIN or password. Do you want to change it now?
Your lock screen PIN or password has expired.
Allows the app to access your email database, including received messages, sent messages, usernames, and passwords.
Allows the app to read your email attachments.

Disallow use of the device\'s camera
Limit the number of emails synced
Restrict the reuse of recent passwords
Require an idle device to lock its screen
Show beside name in conversation list
Use as default for message replies
waiting for verification from all members
waiting for all users to join

Only some \"Plus\" accounts include POP access allowing this program to connect. If you\'re not able to sign in with your correct email address and password, you may not have a paid \"Plus\" account. Launch the web browser to gain access to these email accounts.
Before setting up this email account, visit the T-Online website and create a password for POP3 email access.
"Do you really want to delete the public key '%s'?\nYou can't undo this!"
I\'ll read this later and get back to you.
Let\'s set up a meeting to discuss this.
"You encountered a known bug with Android. Please reinstall OpenKeychain if you want to link your contacts with keys."
Background sync for this account is disabled while\ roaming.
Search is not supported on this account.
"Your own keys can only be deleted individually!"
"Do you really want to delete the SECRET key '%s'?\nYou can't undo this!"
Account \"%s\" changed its security settings; no user action is required.
Account \"%s\" can\'t be synced due to security requirements.
"Select at least one encryption key or a signature key."
"Please select a key to be used for certification!"
Select server sent items folder for %s

"Please specify which file to export to.\nWARNING: File will be overwritten if it exists."

One or more files not attached. Limit %1$s.
Changes you make to all apps and accounts, not just Gmail, will be synchronized between the web, your other devices, and your %1$s.
"This identity has been certified by you."
"This identity has been revoked by the key owner. It is no longer valid."
"This identity has not been certified yet. You cannot be sure if the identity really corresponds to a specific person."
This account isn\'t set up to sync automatically.\nTouch Sync Now to sync mail once, or Change Sync Settings to set up this account to sync mail automatically.
